term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - non-linear distribution isotherm in chromatography
term.title: non-linear distribution isotherm

item.text: A distribution isotherm which is not linear.

notes.item: A non-linear isotherm can have several shapes, as classified by Brunauer et al. In chromatography convex or concave shapes are common, as well as combinations.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 1591. 'Nomenclature for non-linear chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 1593 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668081591)
